name: SCP: The Expedition
description:
SCP: THE EXPEDITION

Create your Mobile Task Forces unit and go on an unforgettable adventure. You must trace the trail of the kidnapped professor. Explore northern Canada, research clues, and prepare to take on the Chaos Insurgency at Red Lake. Find out what the enemy is up to, save the scientist and keep the SCP Foundation safe.

TURN-BASED TACTICAL COMBAT

Plan your actions carefully so as not to be surprised by your opponent. Customize your load-outs, train your soldiers, and tailor your team to your play style. Once you will face the Chaos Insurgency and the next time against an unknown anomaly. You must be ready for anything!

EXPLORATION

Investigate the secrets of the visited locations and learn their stories. This will certainly help in planning clashes. Thorough preparation for the mission is essential, and you will be rewarded for diligence. But beware, danger lurks everywhere!




https://store.steampowered.com/app/2329910/SCP_The_Expedition/

What SCP is?

SCP ("Secure, Contain, Protect") is a fictional secret organization created to protect the world from all kinds of weird and supernatural objects and anomalies. The main thing is the SCP wiki which has descriptions about the various anomalies they've found, test reports, and various events involving them. SCP is probably the largest cooperative writing project on the web.
